name: WhiteNoiseSoundMachineforSleep
0:
”Alexa, launch white noise sound machine”
”Alexa, open white noise sound machine”
”Alexa, start white noise sound machine”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: white noise sound machine
des:
Our beloved White Noise, trusted by over 100 million people from the #1 Sound Machine Podcast in the world - "12 Hour Sound Machines (no loops or fades)".

White Noise is incredibly effective at canceling out sounds you don't want to hear...period. There is a heavier emphasis on high-end frequencies that can counteract incoming sounds and drown out the most insistent of external interruptions. My White Noise listeners may be my most passionately addicted 😄. People use this Sound Machine for all sorts of applications, but it's the gold standard when it comes to sound cancellation. It's wonderful for helping adults and babies alike to fall and stay asleep, for study, for meditation, for managing anxiety, or for any other activities where you want to block out the world and focus solely on the task at hand.

Enjoy the Sound Machine used by over 1.3 million people every week, and tune out the world for once!

[https://12hoursoundmachines.com](https://12hoursoundmachines.com/)

FYI we also have Brown Noise and Pink Noise Sound Machines if you prefer those! Look for the skills with this same logo but that say Brown Noise or Pink Noise instead of White Noise. Or, just say "Alexa, open Brown Noise Sound Machine" or "Alexa, open Pink Noise Sound Machine".

---

***HOW TO USE***

Enable this skill either by clicking the "enable" button above, or saying "Alexa, open White Noise Sound Machine".

By default, the White Noise Sound Machine will play until 1 hour time limit is reached (for the free version). To stop the Sound Machine before that say, "Alexa, stop.” To resume it again say, "Alexa, resume."

***SHOW YOUR SUPPORT:***

If this skill has been helpful for you, I'd be so grateful if you left a review! It actually helps a LOT to boost us on the Alexa Skill Store and makes it easier for others to find it too!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
